messages.title: Our Climate Change Priorities
messages.content:
Ban Fracking
Establish a £2BN Flood Prevention Fund
Pass a Zero Waste Act
Restore Zero Carbon Standard for New Homes
Ban New Petrol and Diesel Cars by 2030
80% of Electricity From Renewable Energy by 2030
Stop Brexit and Continue International Cooperation

messages.title: Our Plan for a Brighter Future
messages.content:
Stop Brexit and Invest the £50BN Remain Bonus
Tackle Our Climate Emergency
Give Every Child the Best Start in Life
Build a Fairer Economy
Tackle the Mental Health Crisis in Our Country

messages.title: My priorities for Mitcham, Morden and Colliers Wood
messages.content:
The Labour Party are letting down the residents of Mitcham and Morden at every level of government. With a Liberal Democrat MP, and Liberal Democrat councillors, things could be so much better.
- The Labour and Tory Parties support Brexit, which will damage our area. The Lib Dems are committed to stopping Brexit and investing in public services instead.
- I will hold the Council to account to ensure potholes are fixed, fly tipping stops and public money is not wasted. I will ensure that Southern and Thameslink services are reliable, and public transport is made safe and accessible for everyone.
I look around the streets where I live and know they can be better. If you agree then make sure you vote to be your MP and build a better future in Mitcham and Morden.

messages.title: Demand Better for Britain
messages.content: Sign up here to support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest the £50BN Remain Bonus in public services and tackle inequality.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers and invest an extra £10 billion a year in schools.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle the Mental Health Crisis in Our Country
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest £1BN and treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

Policies include banning fracking, establishing a £2BN flood prevention fund, passing a zero waste act, restoring zero carbon standard for new homes, banning new petrol and diesel cars by 2030, achieving 80% electricity from renewable energy by 2030, and stopping Brexit.
